original_text:
may ruin overtake them by surprise—
    may the net they hid entangle them,
    may they fall into the pit, to their ruin.
korean_text: 멸망이 순식간에 그에게 닥치게 하시며 그가 숨긴 그물에 자기가 잡히게 하시며 멸망 중에 떨어지게 하소서

sentences.original_text: may ruin overtake them by surprise
may the net they hid entangle them
may they fall into the pit
